spell_tooltip.description: Your body turns into Ice, increasing your Frostbolt damage done by 30% and granting immunity to stun and knockback effects. Lasts 17 sec.

Summon a strong Blizzard that surrounds you for 6 sec that slows enemies by 80% and deals 20,996 Frost damage every 1 sec. 

Enemies that are caught in Snowdrift for 2 sec consecutively become Frozen in ice, stunned for 4 sec.

Places a Frost Bomb on the target. After 5 sec, the bomb explodes, dealing 979,134 Frost damage to the target and 489,350 Frost damage to all other enemies within 10 yards. All affected targets are slowed by 80% for 4 sec. 

If Frost Bomb is dispelled before it explodes, gain a charge of Brain Freeze.

Shields you with ice, absorbing 2.2 million damage for 1 min.

Melee attacks against you reduce the attacker's movement speed by 60%.

Encases you in a block of ice, protecting you from all attacks and damage for 10 sec, but during that time you cannot attack, move, or cast spells.

While inside Ice Block, you heal for 50% of your maximum health over the duration.

Causes Hypothermia, preventing you from recasting Ice Block for 30 sec.

Your spell critical strike damage is increased by 10%. When your direct damage spells fail to critically strike a target, your spell critical strike chance is increased by 2%, up to 10% for 8 sec. 

When your spells critically strike Overflowing Energy is reset.
Magical energy flows through you while in combat, building up to 10% increased damage and then diminishing down to 2% increased damage, cycling every 10 sec.
The cooldown of Ice Block is reduced by 60 sec.
Reduces magic damage taken by 4%.

Creates 3 copies of you nearby for 40 sec, which cast spells and attack your enemies.

While your images are active damage taken is reduced by 20%. Taking direct damage will cause one of your images to dissipate.

Draw power from within, dealing 254,092 Arcane damage over 2.8 sec to enemies within 18 yds. 

While channeling, your Mage ability cooldowns are reduced by 12 sec over 2.8 sec.
Alters the fabric of time, returning you to your current location and health when cast a second time, or after 10 sec. Effect negated by long distance or death.
While inside Ice Block, you heal for 50% of your maximum health over the duration.
Successfully interrupting an enemy with Counterspell reduces its cooldown by 4 sec.

Reduces the cooldown of Alter Time by 10 sec. 

Alter Time resets the cooldown of Blink and Shimmer when you return to your original location.
Your Barriers heal you for 40% of the damage absorbed.
Causes a whirl of icy wind around the enemy, dealing 143,548 Frost damage to the target and all other enemies within 8 yds, freezing them in place for 2 sec. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.
Makes your next Mage spell with a cast time shorter than 10 sec castable while moving. Unaffected by the global cooldown and castable while casting.
Increases Critical Strike chance by 2%.
Increases Haste by 2%.
All of your snare effects reduce the target's movement speed by an additional 10%.
Increases your movement speed by 20% for 3 sec after casting Blink and 40% for 6 sec after returning from Alter Time.
Frost Nova now has 2 charges.
Your barrier's cooldown recharges 30% faster while the shield persists.

Makes you invisible and untargetable for 20 sec, removing all threat. Any action taken cancels this effect.

You take 60% reduced damage while invisible and for 3 sec after reappearing.
Whenever one of your Barriers is removed, reduce its cooldown by 4 sec.
Ice Block now reduces all damage taken by 70% for 6 sec but no longer grants Immunity, prevents movement, attacks, or casting spells. Does not incur the Global Cooldown.
At any moment, you have a chance to gain Icy Veins for 8 sec, Brain Freeze, or Time Warp for 6 sec.
Cast Ice Barrier on yourself and 4 allies within 40 yds.

Quickly fling a shard of ice at the target, dealing 101,364 Frost damage, and 91,147 Frost damage to a second nearby target.

Ice Lance damage is tripled against frozen targets.

Launches an orb of swirling ice up to 40 yds forward which deals up to 406,882 Frost damage to all enemies it passes through over 15 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets. Grants 1 charge of Fingers of Frost when it first damages an enemy.

Enemies damaged by the Frozen Orb are slowed by 40% for 3 sec.

Frostbolt has a 15% chance and Frozen Orb damage has a 5% to grant a charge of Fingers of Frost.

Fingers of Frost causes your next Ice Lance to deal damage as if the target were frozen.

Maximum 2 charges.

Unleash a flurry of ice, striking the target 3 times for a total of 213,615 Frost damage. Each hit reduces the target's movement speed by 80% for 1 sec, has a 25% chance to activate Glacial Assault, and applies Winter's Chill to the target.

Winter's Chill causes the target to take damage from your spells as if it were frozen.
Multiplies the critical strike chance of your spells against frozen targets by 1.5, and adds an additional 50% critical strike chance.
Frostbolt has a 25% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Flurry and cause your next Flurry to deal 50% increased damage.
Frozen Orb deals an additional 30% damage and its duration is increased by 2 sec.

Your Haste is increased by 8%.

You gain 10% more of the Haste stat from all sources.
Frostbolt and Glacial Spike critical strike damage increased by 20%.
Flurry now has 2 charges.
Frostbolt, Ice Lance, and Flurry deal 15% increased damage.
Frozen Orb increases Ice Lance's damage by 15% for 15 sec.
Whenever you attempt to chill a target, you gain Bone Chilling, increasing spell damage you deal by 0.5% for 8 sec, stacking up to 10 times.
Calls down a series of 7 icy comets on and around the target, that deals up to 454,473 Frost damage to all enemies within 6 yds of its impacts.
Damage from Frostbolt and Flurry increases the damage of your Icicles and Glacial Spike by 4%. Stacks up to 2 times.
Each of your Icicles deals 10% additional damage, and when an Icicle deals damage you have a 5% chance to gain the Fingers of Frost effect.

Accelerates your spellcasting for 30 sec, granting 20% haste and preventing damage from delaying your spellcasts.

Activating Icy Veins summons a water elemental to your side for its duration. The water elemental's abilities grant you Frigid Empowerment, increasing the Frost damage you deal by 3%, up to 15%.
Frostbolt and Flurry have a 30% chance to generate 2 Icicles.

Your Comet Storm now applies Numbing Blast, increasing the damage enemies take from you by 6% for 6 sec.

Additionally, Flurry has a 25% chance each hit to call down an icy comet, crashing into your target and nearby enemies for 34,880 Frost damage.

Icy Veins' duration is increased by 5 sec.

Your Ice Lances against frozen targets extend your Icy Veins by an additional 0.5 sec and Glacial Spike extends it an addtional 1.0 sec.

Your Ice Lance and Icicles now deal 5% increased damage, and hit a second nearby target for 90% of their damage.

Your Glacial Spike also hits a second nearby target for 100% of its damage.
Your Ice Lances against frozen targets increase the damage of your Ice Lances by 2% for 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
While Icy Veins is active, your Frostbolts hit up to 2 additional targets and their damage is increased by 15%.
Casting Ice Lance on Frozen targets has a 100% chance to generate an Icicle.

Channel an icy beam at the enemy for 3.5 sec, dealing 307,206 Frost damage every 0.7 sec and slowing movement by 70%. Each time Ray of Frost deals damage, its damage and snare increases by 10%.

Generates 2 charges of Fingers of Frost over its duration.
While Icy Veins is active, damaging an enemy with Frostbolt increases spell damage by 1%. Stacks up to 15 times.

Conjures a massive spike of ice, and merges your current Icicles into it. It impales your target, dealing 737,548 damage plus all of the damage stored in your Icicles, and freezes the target in place for 4 sec. Damage may interrupt the freeze effect.

Requires 5 Icicles to cast.

Passive: Ice Lance no longer launches Icicles.
Each time you consume Fingers of Frost the damage of your next Ray of Frost is increased by 5%, stacking up to 50%. Icy Veins grants 10 stacks instantly.

Your damaging Fire spells generate 1 stack of Fire Mastery and Frost spells generate 1 stack of Frost Mastery.

Fire Mastery increases your haste by 2%, and Frost Mastery increases your Mastery by 2% for 14 sec, stacking up to 6 times each.

Adding stacks does not refresh duration.
Ice Barrier also casts a Blazing Barrier at 25% effectiveness.

Launches a bolt of frostfire at the enemy, causing 151,911 Frostfire damage, slowing movement speed by 60%, and causing an additional 68,875 Frostfire damage over 8 sec.

Frostfire Bolt generates stacks for both Fire Mastery and Frost Mastery.
The cooldown of Fire spells is reduced by 30%.

Comet Storm now also calls down a Meteor at 150% effectiveness onto your target's location.

Meteor now also calls down a Comet Storm at 300% effectiveness onto your target location.
Casting damaging Frost or Fire spells has a high chance to increase the damage of your next Frostfire Bolt by 10%, stacking up to 5 times.

Your Frost and Fire spells have a chance to trigger an additional bolt of Frostfire, dealing 63,581 damage.

This effect generates Frostfire Mastery when activated.

Consuming Excess Fire causes your next Flurry to also cast Ice Nova at 150% effectiveness. Ice Novas cast this way do not freeze enemies in place.

When you consume Excess Frost, the cooldown of Comet Storm is reduced by 3 sec.

Your Frost and Fire spells have a chance to activate Frostfire Empowerment, causing your next Frostfire Bolt to be instant cast, deal 60% increased damage, explode for 80% of its damage to nearby enemies.

Casting Comet Storm causes your next Ice Lance to explode in a Frostfire Burst, dealing 281,850 Frostfire damage to nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.

Frostfire Burst, grants Brain Freeze.

Frostfire Empowerment grants you maximum benefit of Frostfire Mastery, refreshes its duration, and grants you Excess Frost and Excess Fire.

Activating Combustion or Icy Veins grants you Frostfire Empowerment.

Shields you with ice, absorbing 2.2 million damage for 1 min.

Melee attacks against you reduce the attacker's movement speed by 60%.

Encases you in a block of ice, protecting you from all attacks and damage for 10 sec, but during that time you cannot attack, move, or cast spells.

While inside Ice Block, you heal for 50% of your maximum health over the duration.

Causes Hypothermia, preventing you from recasting Ice Block for 30 sec.

Your spell critical strike damage is increased by 10%. When your direct damage spells fail to critically strike a target, your spell critical strike chance is increased by 2%, up to 10% for 8 sec. 

When your spells critically strike Overflowing Energy is reset.
Magical energy flows through you while in combat, building up to 10% increased damage and then diminishing down to 2% increased damage, cycling every 10 sec.
Gain a shield that absorbs 6% of your maximum health for 15 sec after you Blink.
Greater Invisibility increases your movement speed by 80% for 6 sec.
Reduces magic damage taken by 4%.

Creates 3 copies of you nearby for 40 sec, which cast spells and attack your enemies.

While your images are active damage taken is reduced by 20%. Taking direct damage will cause one of your images to dissipate.

Draw power from within, dealing 256,534 Arcane damage over 2.8 sec to enemies within 18 yds. 

While channeling, your Mage ability cooldowns are reduced by 12 sec over 2.8 sec.
Alters the fabric of time, returning you to your current location and health when cast a second time, or after 10 sec. Effect negated by long distance or death.
While inside Ice Block, you heal for 50% of your maximum health over the duration.
Successfully interrupting an enemy with Counterspell reduces its cooldown by 4 sec.

Reduces the cooldown of Alter Time by 10 sec. 

Alter Time resets the cooldown of Blink and Shimmer when you return to your original location.
Causes a whirl of icy wind around the enemy, dealing 144,753 Frost damage to the target and all other enemies within 8 yds, freezing them in place for 2 sec. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.
Teleports you 20 yds forward, unless something is in the way. Unaffected by the global cooldown and castable while casting.
Increases Critical Strike chance by 2%.
Increases Haste by 2%.
All of your snare effects reduce the target's movement speed by an additional 10%.
Increases your movement speed by 20% for 3 sec after casting Blink and 40% for 6 sec after returning from Alter Time.
Frost Nova now has 2 charges.
Casting Ice Lance on Frozen targets reduces the cooldown of your loss of control abilities by 2 sec.

Makes you invisible and untargetable for 20 sec, removing all threat. Any action taken cancels this effect.

You take 60% reduced damage while invisible and for 3 sec after reappearing.
Whenever one of your Barriers is removed, reduce its cooldown by 4 sec.
Ice Block now reduces all damage taken by 70% for 6 sec but no longer grants Immunity, prevents movement, attacks, or casting spells. Does not incur the Global Cooldown.
At any moment, you have a chance to gain Icy Veins for 8 sec, Brain Freeze, or Time Warp for 6 sec.
Cast Ice Barrier on yourself and 4 allies within 40 yds.

Quickly fling a shard of ice at the target, dealing 98,489 Frost damage, and 88,570 Frost damage to a second nearby target.

Ice Lance damage is tripled against frozen targets.

Calls down a series of 7 icy comets on and around the target, that deals up to 453,829 Frost damage to all enemies within 6 yds of its impacts.
Frostbolt grants you Fingers of Frost 25% more often and Brain Freeze 20% more often.

Your Ice Lances against frozen targets increase the damage of your Ice Lances by 2% for 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
While Icy Veins is active, each Frostbolt you cast reduces the cast time of Frostbolt by 4% and increases its damage by 4%, stacking up to 5 times.
Casting Ice Lance on Frozen targets has a 100% chance to generate an Icicle.

Channel an icy beam at the enemy for 3.5 sec, dealing 307,206 Frost damage every 0.7 sec and slowing movement by 70%. Each time Ray of Frost deals damage, its damage and snare increases by 10%.

Generates 2 charges of Fingers of Frost over its duration.

Conjures a massive spike of ice, and merges your current Icicles into it. It impales your target, dealing 740,674 damage plus all of the damage stored in your Icicles, and freezes the target in place for 4 sec. Damage may interrupt the freeze effect.

Requires 5 Icicles to cast.

Passive: Ice Lance no longer launches Icicles.
Each time you consume Fingers of Frost the damage of your next Ray of Frost is increased by 5%, stacking up to 50%. Icy Veins grants 10 stacks instantly.

Casting Icy Veins conjures 8 Frost Splinters.

During Icy Veins, whenever you conjure a Frost Splinter, you have a 100% chance to conjure an additional Frost Splinter.
While a target is under the effects of Blizzard, 30% of the direct damage dealt by a Frost Splinter is also dealt to nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Enemies damaged by your Frozen Orb conjure 1 Frost Splinter, up to 4.

Frozen Orb damage is increased by 10%.
You have 40% increased movement speed during Alter Time.

Your Ice Barrier can absorb up to 50% more damage based on your missing Health.

Max effectiveness when under 50% health.
Whenever an Embedded Frost Splinter is removed, it explodes, dealing 10,459 Frost damage to nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Consuming Winter's Chill with Glacial Spike conjures 2 additional Frost Splinters.

Gain 2% increased critical strike chance.
Gain 5% increased critical strike damage.
Direct damage from Frost Splinters has a 2.0% chance to reset the cooldown of Frozen Orb and increase all damage dealt by Frozen Orb by 15% for 10 sec.

Whenever you have 8 or more active Embedded Frost Splinters, you automatically cast a Splinterstorm at your target.

Splinterstorm:
Shatter all Embedded Frost Splinters, dealing their remaining periodic damage instantly.

Conjure a Frost Splinter for each Splinter shattered, then unleash them all in a devastating barrage, dealing 35,618 Frost damage to your target for each Splinter in the Splinterstorm.

Splinterstorm has a 5% chance to grant Brain Freeze.

Shields you with ice, absorbing 2.2 million damage for 1 min.

Melee attacks against you reduce the attacker's movement speed by 60%.

Causes Hypothermia, preventing you from recasting Ice Block for 30 sec.

When your spells critically strike Overflowing Energy is reset.
Magical energy flows through you while in combat, building up to 10% increased damage and then diminishing down to 2% increased damage, cycling every 10 sec.
Steals a beneficial magic effect from the target. This effect lasts a maximum of 2 min.
Removes all Curses from a friendly target.
Reduces magic damage taken by 4%.

Creates 3 copies of you nearby for 40 sec, which cast spells and attack your enemies.

While your images are active damage taken is reduced by 20%. Taking direct damage will cause one of your images to dissipate.

Causes an explosion around yourself, dealing 55,825 Fire damage to all enemies within 8 yds, knocking them back, and reducing movement speed by 80% for 6 sec.
Increases Critical Strike chance by 2%.
Enemies in a cone in front of you take 69,709 Fire damage and are disoriented for 4 sec. Damage will cancel the effect.
Increases Haste by 2%.

When your barrier receives melee attacks, you have a 10% chance to be granted Fingers of Frost. 

Casting your barrier removes all snare effects.
All of your snare effects reduce the target's movement speed by an additional 10%.
Increases your movement speed by 20% for 3 sec after casting Blink and 40% for 6 sec after returning from Alter Time.

Frozen Orb deals 15% increased damage to units affected by your Blizzard.
Casting Ice Lance on Frozen targets has a 100% chance to generate an Icicle.

Cone of Cold's cooldown is increased to 45 sec and if Cone of Cold hits 3 or more enemies it resets the cooldown of Frozen Orb and Comet Storm. In addition, Cone of Cold applies Winter's Chill to all enemies hit.

Cone of Cold's cooldown can no longer be reduced by your cooldown reduction effects.

Conjures a massive spike of ice, and merges your current Icicles into it. It impales your target, dealing 747,148 damage plus all of the damage stored in your Icicles, and freezes the target in place for 4 sec. Damage may interrupt the freeze effect.

Frostfire Burst, grants Brain Freeze.

Ice Block now reduces all damage taken by 70% for 6 sec but no longer grants Immunity, prevents movement, attacks, or casting spells. Does not incur the Global Cooldown.
At any moment, you have a chance to gain Icy Veins for 8 sec, Brain Freeze, or Time Warp for 6 sec.
Cast Ice Barrier on yourself and 4 allies within 40 yds.

Quickly fling a shard of ice at the target, dealing 100,323 Frost damage, and 89,705 Frost damage to a second nearby target.

Ice Lance damage is tripled against frozen targets.

Launches an orb of swirling ice up to 40 yds forward which deals up to 403,199 Frost damage to all enemies it passes through over 15 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets. Grants 1 charge of Fingers of Frost when it first damages an enemy.

Enemies damaged by the Frozen Orb are slowed by 40% for 3 sec.

Frostbolt has a 15% chance and Frozen Orb damage has a 5% to grant a charge of Fingers of Frost.

Fingers of Frost causes your next Ice Lance to deal damage as if the target were frozen.

Maximum 2 charges.

Unleash a flurry of ice, striking the target 3 times for a total of 213,568 Frost damage. Each hit reduces the target's movement speed by 80% for 1 sec, has a 25% chance to activate Glacial Assault, and applies Winter's Chill to the target.

Winter's Chill causes the target to take damage from your spells as if it were frozen.
Multiplies the critical strike chance of your spells against frozen targets by 1.5, and adds an additional 50% critical strike chance.
Frostbolt has a 25% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Flurry and cause your next Flurry to deal 50% increased damage.
Frozen Orb deals an additional 30% damage and its duration is increased by 2 sec.

Your Haste is increased by 8%.

You gain 10% more of the Haste stat from all sources.
Frostbolt and Glacial Spike critical strike damage increased by 20%.
Flurry now has 2 charges.
Frostbolt, Ice Lance, and Flurry deal 15% increased damage.
Frozen Orb increases Ice Lance's damage by 15% for 15 sec.
Whenever you attempt to chill a target, you gain Bone Chilling, increasing spell damage you deal by 0.5% for 8 sec, stacking up to 10 times.
Calls down a series of 7 icy comets on and around the target, that deals up to 453,981 Frost damage to all enemies within 6 yds of its impacts.
Damage from Frostbolt and Flurry increases the damage of your Icicles and Glacial Spike by 4%. Stacks up to 2 times.
Each of your Icicles deals 10% additional damage, and when an Icicle deals damage you have a 5% chance to gain the Fingers of Frost effect.

Accelerates your spellcasting for 30 sec, granting 20% haste and preventing damage from delaying your spellcasts.

Activating Icy Veins summons a water elemental to your side for its duration. The water elemental's abilities grant you Frigid Empowerment, increasing the Frost damage you deal by 3%, up to 15%.
Frostbolt and Flurry have a 30% chance to generate 2 Icicles.

Your Comet Storm now applies Numbing Blast, increasing the damage enemies take from you by 6% for 6 sec.

Additionally, Flurry has a 25% chance each hit to call down an icy comet, crashing into your target and nearby enemies for 34,880 Frost damage.

Icy Veins' duration is increased by 5 sec.

Your Ice Lances against frozen targets extend your Icy Veins by an additional 0.5 sec and Glacial Spike extends it an addtional 1.0 sec.

Your Ice Lance and Icicles now deal 5% increased damage, and hit a second nearby target for 90% of their damage.

Your Glacial Spike also hits a second nearby target for 100% of its damage.
Your Ice Lances against frozen targets increase the damage of your Ice Lances by 2% for 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
While Icy Veins is active, your Frostbolts hit up to 2 additional targets and their damage is increased by 15%.
Casting Ice Lance on Frozen targets has a 100% chance to generate an Icicle.

Channel an icy beam at the enemy for 3.5 sec, dealing 307,206 Frost damage every 0.7 sec and slowing movement by 70%. Each time Ray of Frost deals damage, its damage and snare increases by 10%.

Generates 2 charges of Fingers of Frost over its duration.
While Icy Veins is active, damaging an enemy with Frostbolt increases spell damage by 1%. Stacks up to 15 times.

Conjures a massive spike of ice, and merges your current Icicles into it. It impales your target, dealing 734,859 damage plus all of the damage stored in your Icicles, and freezes the target in place for 4 sec. Damage may interrupt the freeze effect.

Requires 5 Icicles to cast.

Passive: Ice Lance no longer launches Icicles.
Each time you consume Fingers of Frost the damage of your next Ray of Frost is increased by 5%, stacking up to 50%. Icy Veins grants 10 stacks instantly.
Ice Barrier also casts a Blazing Barrier at 25% effectiveness.

Launches a bolt of frostfire at the enemy, causing 155,018 Frostfire damage, slowing movement speed by 60%, and causing an additional 68,875 Frostfire damage over 8 sec.

Frostfire Bolt generates stacks for both Fire Mastery and Frost Mastery.
The cooldown of Fire spells is reduced by 30%.

Comet Storm now also calls down a Meteor at 150% effectiveness onto your target's location.

Meteor now also calls down a Comet Storm at 300% effectiveness onto your target location.
Casting damaging Frost or Fire spells has a high chance to increase the damage of your next Frostfire Bolt by 10%, stacking up to 5 times.

Your Frost and Fire spells have a chance to trigger an additional bolt of Frostfire, dealing 63,581 damage.

This effect generates Frostfire Mastery when activated.

Consuming Excess Fire causes your next Flurry to also cast Ice Nova at 150% effectiveness. Ice Novas cast this way do not freeze enemies in place.

When you consume Excess Frost, the cooldown of Comet Storm is reduced by 3 sec.

Your Frost and Fire spells have a chance to activate Frostfire Empowerment, causing your next Frostfire Bolt to be instant cast, deal 60% increased damage, explode for 80% of its damage to nearby enemies.

Casting Comet Storm causes your next Ice Lance to explode in a Frostfire Burst, dealing 279,470 Frostfire damage to nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.

Frostfire Burst, grants Brain Freeze.

Frostfire Empowerment grants you maximum benefit of Frostfire Mastery, refreshes its duration, and grants you Excess Frost and Excess Fire.

Activating Combustion or Icy Veins grants you Frostfire Empowerment.

Shields you in flame, absorbing 1.8 million damage for 1 min.

Melee attacks against you cause the attacker to take 15,085 Fire damage.

Encases you in a block of ice, protecting you from all attacks and damage for 10 sec, but during that time you cannot attack, move, or cast spells.

While inside Ice Block, you heal for 50% of your maximum health over the duration.

Causes Hypothermia, preventing you from recasting Ice Block for 30 sec.

Your spell critical strike damage is increased by 10%. When your direct damage spells fail to critically strike a target, your spell critical strike chance is increased by 2%, up to 10% for 8 sec. 

When your spells critically strike Overflowing Energy is reset.
Magical energy flows through you while in combat, building up to 10% increased damage and then diminishing down to 2% increased damage, cycling every 10 sec.
Gain a shield that absorbs 6% of your maximum health for 15 sec after you Blink.
Greater Invisibility increases your movement speed by 80% for 6 sec.
Removes all Curses from a friendly target.
Reduces magic damage taken by 4%.

Creates 3 copies of you nearby for 40 sec, which cast spells and attack your enemies.

While your images are active damage taken is reduced by 20%. Taking direct damage will cause one of your images to dissipate.

Draw power from within, dealing 251,044 Arcane damage over 2.8 sec to enemies within 18 yds. 

While channeling, your Mage ability cooldowns are reduced by 12 sec over 2.8 sec.
Alters the fabric of time, returning you to your current location and health when cast a second time, or after 10 sec. Effect negated by long distance or death.
Successfully interrupting an enemy with Counterspell reduces its cooldown by 4 sec.

Reduces the cooldown of Alter Time by 10 sec. 

Alter Time resets the cooldown of Blink and Shimmer when you return to your original location.
Your Barriers heal you for 20% of the damage absorbed.
Makes your next Mage spell with a cast time shorter than 10 sec castable while moving. Unaffected by the global cooldown and castable while casting.
Causes an explosion around yourself, dealing 57,563 Fire damage to all enemies within 8 yds, knocking them back, and reducing movement speed by 80% for 6 sec.
Increases Critical Strike chance by 2%.
Increases Haste by 2%.
All of your snare effects reduce the target's movement speed by an additional 10%.
The cooldowns of Blink and Shimmer are reduced by 4 sec.
Increases your movement speed by 20% for 3 sec after casting Blink and 40% for 6 sec after returning from Alter Time.
Frost Nova now has 2 charges.
Teleports you back to where you last Blinked and heals you for 1.6 million health. Only usable within 8 sec of Blinking.
Ice Block now reduces all damage taken by 70% for 6 sec but no longer grants Immunity, prevents movement, attacks, or casting spells. Does not incur the Global Cooldown.
While you have Temporal Displacement or other similar effects, you may use Time Warp to grant yourself 30% Haste for 40 sec.

Shields you with an arcane force, absorbing 1.8 million damage and reducing magic damage taken by 15% for 1 min.

The duration of harmful Magic effects against you is reduced by 25%.

Encases you in a block of ice, protecting you from all attacks and damage for 10 sec, but during that time you cannot attack, move, or cast spells.

While inside Ice Block, you heal for 50% of your maximum health over the duration.

Causes Hypothermia, preventing you from recasting Ice Block for 30 sec.

Your spell critical strike damage is increased by 10%. When your direct damage spells fail to critically strike a target, your spell critical strike chance is increased by 2%, up to 10% for 8 sec. 

When your spells critically strike Overflowing Energy is reset.
Magical energy flows through you while in combat, building up to 10% increased damage and then diminishing down to 2% increased damage, cycling every 10 sec.
The cooldown of Ice Block is reduced by 60 sec.
Gain a shield that absorbs 6% of your maximum health for 15 sec after you Blink.
Removes all Curses from a friendly target.

Creates 3 copies of you nearby for 40 sec, which cast spells and attack your enemies.

While your images are active damage taken is reduced by 20%. Taking direct damage will cause one of your images to dissipate.

Draw power from within, dealing 252,971 Arcane damage over 2.8 sec to enemies within 18 yds. 

While channeling, your Mage ability cooldowns are reduced by 12 sec over 2.8 sec.
Alters the fabric of time, returning you to your current location and health when cast a second time, or after 10 sec. Effect negated by long distance or death.
While inside Ice Block, you heal for 25% of your maximum health over the duration.
Successfully interrupting an enemy with Counterspell reduces its cooldown by 4 sec.

Reduces the cooldown of Alter Time by 10 sec. 

Alter Time resets the cooldown of Blink and Shimmer when you return to your original location.
Your Barriers heal you for 40% of the damage absorbed.
Teleports you 20 yds forward, unless something is in the way. Unaffected by the global cooldown and castable while casting.
Increases Critical Strike chance by 2%.
Increases Haste by 2%.

When your barrier receives melee attacks, you have a 10% chance to be granted Fingers of Frost. 

Casting your barrier removes all snare effects.
The cooldowns of Blink and Shimmer are reduced by 4 sec.
Increases your movement speed by 20% for 3 sec after casting Blink and 40% for 6 sec after returning from Alter Time.
Teleports you back to where you last Blinked and heals you for 1.6 million health. Only usable within 8 sec of Blinking.
At any moment, you have a chance to gain Icy Veins for 8 sec, Brain Freeze, or Time Warp for 6 sec.
